name: Pixel Runner: A dungeon adventure
description:
Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Interact/Attack: SPACE

Pixel Runner: A dungeon adventure

In Pixel Runner, you explore the dungeons and fight with the enemies while trying to get as many scores as you can. As you get high scores, you unlock new dungeons and each dungeon comes with a unique set of enemies. 

Destroy the enemies to survive in the dungeons and collect the coins and treasures. With collected coins, you can unlock new characters with unique powers. Currently, there are 5 main characters that you can play. 

Dungeons are randomly generated so every time you play, you will run in different dungeon corridors. 

As the score increases the dungeon will become more challenging with the intense gameplay.
